website_summaries.verdict: Easy to read and understand yet informative. A basic guide that introduces potential police officers to the process of studying for the exam, but it won't cut it as the only source for acing the real test.
pros: Written by former LAPD member Raymond E. Foster
Includes practice tests and informative answers to questions
Part of a popular series of informative guides
cons: Information isn't equally relevant in all states
Not as challenging as the actual police officer exam

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for helping prepare for math
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this book to help him study for his exam. He said most sections were pretty helpful. However, he bought this mainly for the math sections. He asked me for help on some of the problems since I am a math major and he did not understand the solutions provided. However, at least two of the problems I noticed solve the problem a very difficult way. I had to show him a much simpler way to solve it. I also noticed that on one problem all the multiple choice answers are incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: B. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great Book!
customer_reviews.text: I passed the police test with the help of this book. I made a 98 and still not a police officer. I guess I need to change my gender???
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brent

customer_reviews.title: Passed the written exam like a God
customer_reviews.text: Passed the written exam like a God. Though it is printed in 2011. This book still has relevant info to get you prepared for the process. 10 out of 10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JUN

customer_reviews.title: Helped me Alot
customer_reviews.text: This book helped me get a basis of what to expect on the PD exam. It helped me refresh my memory on how to work out math problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for Nypd test, but it's not so good if you're taking a Texas test.
customer_reviews.author: edwini18

customer_reviews.title: Great Review
customer_reviews.text: I aced the test so this certainly helped. Sat down and read through everything the night before. The practice test was particularly helpful - math problems were spot on.
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: They really like it and found it helpful to give them an ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a student who wants to become an NYPD officer. They really like it and found it helpful to give them an overview of the exam before they go an buy other necessary books to study for the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still haven't made it in, but it's helping quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: study
customer_reviews.text: study with this book and i love it. great examples and all. use it to do my daily reading and test questions about law enforcement etc etc
customer_reviews.author: tazvang

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This book is recommended for those trying to get into our police department. It is a very good and easy to understand book
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ripped in the back. Someone had to have seen that..
customer_reviews.author: Shalyne Green

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good book, that breaks each component down that could be on a test. It was very easy to understand, and learn from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The questions are too simple, do not rely on it.
customer_reviews.text: The problems inside are too simple. Lack of deep reading of polygraph and psychological exam.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This book is just as it is described ... I have taken a few police officer test since reading this book and it does touch every kind of question on the exam
customer_reviews.author: jenae' makayla danielle lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great book really helped me get ready for the test
customer_reviews.text: Great book, really helped me get ready for the test. Gave great insite on what to expect. The practice test are a big big help.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOK!
customer_reviews.text: Great book! I'd recommend it to anybody taking the POST testing or going thru the testing for police officer
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Pickering

customer_reviews.title: still has some good points worth reading
customer_reviews.text: i thought it was more for the exam after graduating the academy, but it seems to be a book more on how to pass the entrance exam into the academy....but, still has some good points worth reading.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppyish

customer_reviews.title: Great book. Took test before and didn't pass high ...
customer_reviews.text: Great book. Took test before and didn't pass high enough. Just took test after studying this book for 2 months and pass!
customer_reviews.author: J+C

customer_reviews.title: Police officer exams for dummies.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an actor, nor have I received and payment by this company to endorse it. Therefore this book made my civil service exam for deputy sheriff a breeze. Everything on the test I had become familiar with in the book. No surprises that I hadn't been prepared for by this product. A+
customer_reviews.author: Michael, wv

customer_reviews.title: cops
customer_reviews.text: Not very helpful for the exam but is informational if you want to know the process to become a cop
customer_reviews.author: Sean R. Conroy

customer_reviews.title: None of the information was on the test
customer_reviews.text: My husband read and completed all the practice tests in this book then when he got to his police exam none of this was on it. He came home saying he shouldnt have wasted his time on this book.
customer_reviews.author: Srdsmdmad

customer_reviews.title: I passed my test thanks to this book!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This book was GREAT! I took the test the first time and didn't know what to expect and failed it. This book covers everything you need to know to pass, the second time I took the test I made a 88, Now I have my dream job.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Denley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preparing for the NPOST
customer_reviews.text: I used this study guide to prepare for the National Police Officer Selection Test. If you use this guide you will be well prepared. I took the test a few weeks after working through the book and sample tests and was 100% prepared for the exam. The questions on the actual exam are right on with the material covered in this book. I highly recommend this if you are getting ready to take the test. If you can pass the practice exams here, you can pass the NPOST.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M

customer_reviews.title: I don't not regret buying this book
customer_reviews.text: This book is very helpful. This book has everything. It's a lot of challenge. A lot of good informe you.
customer_reviews.author: Zeeke

customer_reviews.title: It's a book.
customer_reviews.text: This book is more or less worthless if you have even the slightest ability to use google. Most of it is common sense (one of the big points is to dress well and get a good night's sleep...truly groundbreaking information). For what it is, it is well written but don't expect any great insight.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Basic information but great as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: A bit basic, but good information. The gift recipient liked it.Very much USA focused but a lot of the information is general.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: for my son
customer_reviews.text: he learn a lot from the book ,he study to be a cop he enjoy it ,help him in school too
customer_reviews.author: Marceline castro

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: One of the best books I bought to study with. Would recommend to anyone who want to study for the police exam
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: "Police" and "Dummies" all in the same title. Wouldn't most folks consider that to be redundant?
customer_reviews.author: D. N. Johnston
